high_descs: Move to the wooden desk behind the bed
Pick up the CD on top of the desk
Carry the CD to the desk on the right
Turn on the lamp on the top shelf of the desk
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a CD

high_descs: Move to the desk at the foot of the bed
Pick up a CD from the desk
Move to the left side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Inspect a CD with a lamp on the desk.

high_descs: Turn to the left, go to the desk
Take the CD from the desk
Turn to the right, take a few steps
Face the trash can, turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Take the cd from the desk, turn on the lamp
